channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Windows Recall Works—and Whether You Should Switch It On
item.description: Windows Recall is one of the biggest AI features Microsoft has added to Windows 11. It’s useful, but it comes with some privacy tradeoffs.

item.title: The 31 Best Deals From REI’s 2025 Holiday Sale
item.description: The company that wants you to #optoutside for Black Friday is having its sale early. Gear up for next year with these great deals on packs, sleeping b...

item.title: ChatGPT launches pilot group chats across Japan, New Zealand, South Korea, and Taiwan
item.description: OpenAI on Thursday unveiled a group chat feature for ChatGPT, currently in pilot across Japan, New Zealand, South Korea, and Taiwan, allowing users to...

item.title: You Won’t Be Able to Offload Your Holiday Shopping to AI Agents Anytime Soon
item.description: Chatbot developers and retail giants are battling over user data as they lay the foundation for a future in which AI agents can do all your online sho...

item.title: Airports and Airlines Are Crawling Out of the Shutdown
item.description: The US government shutdown may be over, but the flying troubles aren’t—especially heading into the holiday season.

item.title: Best Holiday Photo Cards (2025): Mixbook, Vistaprint, Canva
item.description: Mailing a holiday card this season? Here’s our top three after printing and testing 11 different holiday cards.

item.title: Apple’s new App Review Guidelines clamp down on apps sharing personal data with ‘third-party AI’
item.description: Apple updates its App Store rules to restrict apps from sharing personal data with third-party AI without disclosure and explicit permission.

item.title: Build Mode starts at the beginning: How Forethought AI found product-market fit

item.title: Blue Origin sticks first New Glenn rocket landing and launches NASA spacecraft
item.description: It's an impressive accomplishment for the new mega-rocket launch system, and paves the way for the company to start re-using the boosters in commercia...

item.title: VCs abandon old rules for a ‘funky time’ of investing in AI startups
item.description: The goalposts are moving for AI startups when it comes to growth, product features, and just about everything else.
